entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023
